content.prompt: The material prosperity evident in Image 1 was in part attributable to which of the following?

choices.label: The social welfare policies instituted by governments of the German states
The increasing standard of living of German industrial workers
The adoption by the Frankfurt Parliament of a liberal constitution for Germany
The restoration of political stability in the aftermath of the Congress of Vienna

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
